content:
# It seems that I successfully moved to the nearest Copper Ore patch. Now, I need to harvest some Copper Ore to ensure I have enough for smelting into Copper Plates.

# I will proceed to harvest a quantity of Copper Ore, let's say 10 units, to ensure I have sufficient material for the Stone Furnace.
harvest_resource(nearest_copper_patch, quantity=10)  # Harvesting 10 units of Copper Ore from the patch.

# After harvesting, I will check my inventory to confirm the amount of Copper Ore collected.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Copper Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Output current inventory after harvesting.
